About me

<   />
I'm a passionate web developer from Italy that is constantly looking to improve his skills both on front and back end.
I started this journey because I love the combination of creativity, logic and technology that this field requires.
Outside of my developer life I'm a gym bro that likes to lift weights and kick some bags.

Skills

projects

Shopping Website

A Shopping Website app built with React. You can search and filter items and also add them to the cart. Data is managed with React hooks and Local Storage.

Live App Source Code

CV Generator

This app lets you build your own Curriculum Vitae by providing you a built in ready template. Insert your info in the form on the left and when you're ready you can print the preview on the right. Data is managed with React hooks and Local Storage.

Live App Source Code

Memory Game

A Game built with React that utilizes Asynchronous Javascript and API fetching. Game Rules: get points by clicking on a pokemon but don't click on any more than once.

Live App Source Code
